;;;59     unsigned LCD_Color2Index_1(LCD_COLOR Color) {
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
000002  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;60       int r,g,b;
;;;61       r = Color      &255;
000004  b2ca              UXTB     r2,r1
;;;62       g = (Color>>8) &255;
000006  f3c12307          UBFX     r3,r1,#8,#8
;;;63       b = Color>>16;
00000a  0c0c              LSRS     r4,r1,#16
;;;64       return (r+g+b+383) /(3*255);
00000c  18d0              ADDS     r0,r2,r3
00000e  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
000010  f200107f          ADD      r0,r0,#0x17f
000014  f24025fd          MOV      r5,#0x2fd
000018  fb90f0f5          SDIV     r0,r0,r5
;;;65     }
00001c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;66     
                          ENDP

000000  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
;;;80       return 0x01;
;;;81     }
000002  4770              BX       lr

                          ENDP

;;;71     LCD_COLOR LCD_Index2Color_1(int Index) {
000000  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;72       return Index ? 0xFFFFFF : 0;
000002  b111              CBZ      r1,|L3.10|
000004  f06f407f          MVN      r0,#0xff000000
